description: An official SIML (Synthetic Intelligence Markup Language) interpreter for .Net Framework. This is a Portable Class Library and can target multiple platforms. Using this library developers can easily create intelligent Chatbots or integrate Artificial Intelligence and Natural Language Processing to their .Net and Mono applications.
releaseNotes:
1. Fixed minor bug with Set name conflicts.
2. Better criterion for determining result success.
3. JavaScript Processing-Instruction added.
4. Added Lua as a Scripting-Language.
5. Moved Context and ContextProcessor to Syn.Bot namespace.
6. Added Processing-Instruction interface to Lua.
7. Add Variables using Lambda Expressions.
8. Is-Main functional Variable added to BotUser.
9. User-Strict Concept Support added.
10. StoreExamples check added to Example parser.
11. Smaller internal Enumeration footprint.
12. Ranged Wildcards support added.
13. Initial private concept using "Initial-Concept" user variable.
14. Added static Version property on SynBot.
15. Fixed minor Bug with Range Wildcard self prioritization.
16. Added Zero index option to Input element.
title: Syn Bot
